sentence.text: Drug interaction studies with decitabine have not been conducted.
sentence.negationtags: <xcope>Drug interaction studies with decitabine have <cue>not</cue> been conducted</xcope>.

sentence.text: In vitro studies in human liver microsomes suggest that decitabine is unlikely to inhibit or induce cytochrome P450 enzymes.
In vitro metabolism studies have suggested that decitabine is not a substrate for the human liver cytochrome P450 enzymes.
sentence.negationtags: In vitro metabolism studies have suggested that decitabine is <xcope><cue>not</cue> a substrate for the human liver cytochrome P450 enzymes</xcope>.

sentence.text: As plasma protein binding of decitabine is negligible ( 1%), interactions due to displacement of more highly protein bound drugs from plasma proteins are not expected.
sentence.negationtags: As plasma protein binding of decitabine is negligible ( 1%), interactions due to displacement of more highly protein bound drugs from plasma proteins are <xcope><cue>not</cue> expected</xcope>.
